itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding Flax Thread. It requires the knowledge of Grinding: Beginner.

※ Find Ornella in Heidel and complete the Materials for Equipment Repair Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Flax Thread
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Flax.

item.name: Silver Embroidered Trainer's Clothes
item.desc: A noble outfit made for Trainers.

item.name: Silver Embroidered Gatherer's Clothes
item.desc: A noble outfit made for Gatherers.

item.name: Silver Embroidered Fisher's Clothes
item.desc: A noble outfit made for Fishers.

item.name: [Witch] Calpheon Noble Dress
item.desc:
A dress for Calpheon aristocrats. It's both fabulous and practical.
- Item effect: Amity +15% from a conversation
※ If you use a costume exchange coupon, you'll get the same dress with an additional effect of moving speed +2. The costume can be equipped in the same slot as the pearl costume.
If you exchange it for a costume, you cannot register it to the Marketplace.

item.name: [Valkyrie] Calpheon Noble Dress
item.desc:
A dress worn by Calpheon aristocrats. It's both fabulous and practical.

- Item Effect: Amity +15% from a conversation

※ If you use a costume exchange coupon, you will get the same dress with an additional effect of Movement Speed +2. The costume can be equipped in the same slot as a pearl costume.

If you exchange it for a costume, you cannot register it to the Item Marketplace.

item.name: White Wagon Cover
item.desc:
A cover for a wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).
